text: Pas aey Nabi, sabr karo jis tarhan ulul azm (strong will) Rasoolon ne sabr kiya hai, aur inke maamle mein jaldi na karo. Jis roz yeh log us cheez ko dekh lenge jiska inhein khauff dilaya ja raha hai to inhein yun maloon hoga ke jaise duniya mein din ki ek ghadi bhar se zyada nahin rahey thay. Baat pahuncha di gayi, ab kya nafarmaan logon ke siwa aur koi halak hoga
